org.dejave.attica.storage
Class Page

java.lang.Object
  org.dejave.attica.storage.Page
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Tuple>
public class Page
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Tuple>

Page: The basic representation of an attica page. NB: this is the language representation -- disk pages will likely vary.

Author:
sviglas

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new page given its schema and page identifier.
